pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, June 23, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Media Appearances

8:30 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Toujours le matin, on ICI Radio-Canada Première, Mauricie–Centre-du-Québec.

8:40 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Tout un matin, on ICI Radio-Canada Première.
